ComicInfo.Title: If I Should Die Before I Wake...!
ComicInfo.Summary: If I Should Die Before I Wake...!: Eilif is granted strength by Odin so he can assist Thor in fighting Fafnir.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:25:28. [Issue ID 38689]
ComicInfo.Characters: Eilif,Toothgnasher (Thor's goat),Thor,Cloud-Rider (Valkyrie's horse),Munnin (Odin's Raven),Lorelei,Heimdall,Haag,Odin (disguised as an old wanderer),Karnilla,Surtur,Greg Glenn (news reporter),Fafnir,Toothgrinder (Thor's goat),Valkyries,Chuck Cherkle (news reporter)
